com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce

Interface Counter


  • public interface Counter
    Counter is an integer variable that is aggregated across multiple shards. Can be used to do statistical calculations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName() 
      long getValue() 
      void increment(long delta)
      Increment counter.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        counter name.

      • getValue

        long getValue()
        Returns:
        counter value. This is the value only in the current shard. It doesn't include contributions from other shards, if accessed from within mapper/reducer.

      • increment

        void increment(long delta)
        Increment counter.
        Parameters:
        delta - increment delta. Can be negative.
